name: joed5
description: The procedures and adverse events regstration system provided by JSGOE (C) 2020-2025 P4mohnet and 日本産科婦人科内視鏡学会

scripts.electron:serve: vite build --mode electron --config vite.main.config.ts && vite build --mode electron --config vite.preload.config.ts && concurrently -k  "vite --mode electron" "wait-on http://localhost:5173 && cross-env NODE_ENV=development VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://localhost:5173 electron ."
scripts.electron:build: vite build --mode electron && vite build --mode electron --config vite.main.config.ts && vite build --mode electron --config vite.preload.config.ts && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.cjs
scripts.electron:build.skipbundle: vite build --mode electron --config vite.main.config.ts && vite build --mode electron --config vite.preload.config.ts && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.cjs
scripts.electron:build.nopack: vite build --mode electron && vite build --mode electron --config vite.main.config.ts && vite build --mode electron --config vite.preload.config.ts && electron-builder --dir --config electron-builder.config.cjs
scripts.electron:build.production: vite build --mode electron.production && vite build --mode electron.production --config vite.main.config.ts && vite build --mode electron.production --config vite.preload.config.ts && electron-builder --config electron-builder.config.cjs
